summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2363 for the improvement of Market Street from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest; all in The City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24671 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
